deadline."},"commitTeam(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"defHash":"of the player's Defender selection","fwdHash":"of the player's Forward selection","gameId":"of the game that the player wants to commit their team to for","gkHash":"of the player's Goalkeeper selection","midHash":"of the player's Midfield selection"}},"createGame(uint256)":{"params":{"wager":"for the game"},"return":"gameId of the newly created game in"},"getSaltedHash(bytes,bytes)":{"params":{"data":"to be hashed","salt":"to hash the data with"},"return":"saltedHash of the data and salt"},"getTeamCommitForGame(uint256,address)":{"params":{"gameId":"for the game in question","player":"address whose team commit you want"},"return":"a bytes32 array of the commit hashes"},"incrementGameweek(uint256)":{"params":{"_deadline":"time epoch of the live gameweek"}},"isPaused()":{"details":"Circuit breaker for contract","return":"boolean of whether or not the contract is currently paused"},"joinGame(uint256)":{"params":{"gameId":"of the game that the player wants to join"},"return":"the gameId"},"revealTeam(bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256,bytes,uint256)":{"params":{"defReveal":"reveal hash of the player's Defender selection","fwdReveal":"reveal hash of the player's Forward selection","gameId":"of the active game","gkReveal":"reveal hash of the player's Goalkeeper selection","midReveal":"reveal hash of the player's Midfield selection","salt":"that the original commits have been hashed with","totalScore":"accumulated by the submitted team"}},"teamRevealed(uint256,address)":{"params":{"gameId":"for the game in question","player":"address whose team you want to check the reveal status"},"return":"whether or not the player has revealed their team"},"toggleDeadlinePassed()":{"details":"should be called by admin when the gameweek deadline has passed"},"totalGames()":{"return":"the total number of games that have ever been created"},"viewDeadlineStatus()":{"return":"boolean of whether or not the gameweek deadline has passed"},"viewGameDetails(uint256)":{"params":{"gameId":"of the game "},"return":"player information, wager, whether or not the game is open, and whether or not the game is finished"},"viewPlayerScore(uint256,address)":{"params":{"gameId":"for the game in question","player":"address whose team you want to check the score"},"return":"player score for game"},"viewWinner(uint256)":{"params":{"gameId":"for the game you want to see the winner of"},"return":"address of the winner"},"withdrawPayout(uint256)":{"params":{"gameId":"of the game the caller wants to withdraw payout for"}}},"title":"A lightweight PvP card game based on Fantasy Premier League."},"userdoc":{"methods":{"__callback(bytes32,string)":{"notice":"Handles ProvableAPI call gameweek"},"isPaused()":{"notice":"Returns the pause status of the contract"},"joinGame(uint256)":{"notice":"Allows a second player to join an open been revealed for a given game"},"toggleContractPause()":{"notice":"Allows the admin to pause certain contract functions to be called in case of emergency Functions paused in emergency are: status"},"viewGameDetails(uint256)":{"notice":"Return information for a given game"},"viewPlayerScore(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Retrieves final score for a given player for a game"},"viewWinner(uint256)":{"notice":"Retrives the winner for a given game"},"withdrawFunds()":{"notice":"Allows league admin to withdraw funds from the devdoc.author: Nichanan Kesonpat

__callback(bytes32,string).details: sets the 'deadlinePassed' variable to true if the current time exceeds the gameweek deadline.

params.gameId: of the game that the player wants to commit their team to for

createGame(uint256).return: gameId of the newly created game in

getSaltedHash(bytes,bytes).return: saltedHash of the data and salt

params.player: address whose team commit you want

getTeamCommitForGame(uint256,address).return: a bytes32 array of the commit hashes

params._deadline: time epoch of the live gameweek

isPaused().return: boolean of whether or not the contract is currently paused

params.gameId: of the game that the player wants to join

params.defReveal: reveal hash of the player's Defender selection
params.fwdReveal: reveal hash of the player's Forward selection
params.gkReveal: reveal hash of the player's Goalkeeper selection
params.midReveal: reveal hash of the player's Midfield selection
params.salt: that the original commits have been hashed with

params.player: address whose team you want to check the reveal status

teamRevealed(uint256,address).return: whether or not the player has revealed their team

toggleDeadlinePassed().details: should be called by admin when the gameweek deadline has passed

totalGames().return: the total number of games that have ever been created

viewDeadlineStatus().return: boolean of whether or not the gameweek deadline has passed

viewGameDetails(uint256).return: player information, wager, whether or not the game is open, and whether or not the game is finished

params.player: address whose team you want to check the score

params.gameId: for the game you want to see the winner of
of the game the caller wants to withdraw payout for

devdoc.title: A lightweight PvP card game based on Fantasy Premier League.

commitTeam(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes.notice: Stores hashes of a players' team selection for a given game

createGame(uint256).notice: Allows a player to create their game and stores the new game in the 'games' mapping

getSaltedHash(bytes,bytes).notice: Hashes a given piece of data with a given salt

getTeamCommitForGame(uint256,address).notice: Returns a player's team commit for a given game

isPaused().notice: Returns the pause status of the contract

joinGame(uint256).notice: Allows a second player to join an open game

revealTeam(bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint2.notice: Check if reveal hashes match the commit hash

teamRevealed(uint256,address).notice: Checks if the player's team has been revealed for a given game

toggleContractPause().notice: Allows the admin to pause certain contract functions to be called in case of emergency Functions paused in emergency are: createGame, joinGame, commitTeam, and revealTeam

toggleDeadlinePassed().notice: Queries the current time (GMT+1) using Provable

viewGameDetails(uint256).notice: Return information for a given game

viewPlayerScore(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves final score for a given player for a game

viewWinner(uint256).notice: Retrives the winner for a given game

withdrawFunds().notice: Allows league admin to withdraw funds from the contract.

withdrawPayout(uint256).notice: Allows the game winner to withdraw their payout

withdrawRefund().notice: Lets the user withdraw the refund in case of overpayment or game cancellation
